modName: Durzo Blint Follower - The Night Angel Triology
summary:
For Durzo Blint, assassination is an art. 
And he is the city’s most accomplished artist.
Durzo Blint from the Night Angel Triology by Brent Weeks.
descriptionHtml:
For Durzo Blint, assassination is an art. 
And he is the city’s most accomplished artist.
Durzo Blint from the Night Angel Triology by Brent Weeks.

Durzo Blint is exceptionally Talented. He is extremely adept with his Talent, using it in ingenious ways. He has used his Talent to fast-healing, boost his strength and speed, muffle his footsteps and to cloak himself in shadows.
You can find him in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood
or use Console Commonads like: help Durzo
If he wont follow you open the console and type in: player.setrelationshiprank (his ID) 3
If there are any bugs please tell me so I can remove them.
author: Darkerthan3lack
